title: You Won't Believe this 3 Bedroom 2 Bath Home!
posting_body: ['show contact info', 'Ext 300', 'Get out of that tiny rental and into this beautiful NEW 3 bedroom home in as little as 45 days!', 'We have incredible  savings being offered this weekend!', 'Call today for more information!', 'Featured Home:', 'The Pecan Plan', '3 Bedrooms', '2 Bathrooms', 'Huge Primary Suite', 'Granite Countertops', 'Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances Included', 'Fully Fenced Backyard W/', 'Large Patio', '$0 Down Payment Options Available!', 'Only $1,229/month', 'Call today to schedule a tour for this weekend!', 'show contact info', 'Ext 300', 'Phone calls are preferred.', 'If you are replying to this post by email, please include your phone number.', '*P & I. Price $269,900, 5.5% Fixed/5.572% APR, 20% Down, Conv. 30 Year, OAC from third party lender.', 'Other fees such as taxes, insurance and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.', 'Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.', 'Come tour this home located minutes from: Sugar Land, Richmond, Pecan Grove, Rosenberg, Needville, Fairchilds, Missouri City, Greatwood, Brazos Town Center, First Colony Mall, Brazos Bend State Park, Seabourne Creek, Sugar Land Town Square, Fort Bend']
